options: ['1981', 'the late half of the 18thcentury', 'the late half of the 19thcentury', 'the late half of the 20thcentury']
questions: The original building of Museum of Fine Arts was completed in  _  .
article:
The Museum of Fine Arts, located in Boston Massachusetts, was founded in 1870. The current buildings, the result of many additions and restructures of the original building, were completed in 1981.
Today the museum is home to more than 25,000 square feet of exhibition space. The collection varies and includes Asian art, Egyptian Old Kingdom sculptures, and collections of silver, decorative arts, furniture drawings, costumes, and musical instruments.
One special note is the Museum extensive Impressionistic collection. Work from such artists as Degas, Van Gogh, and Monet are included and available for viewing.
